definitions.definition: A hand tool or power tool which engages with the head of a screw and allows torque to be applied to turn the screw, thus driving it in or loosening it.
A cocktail made of vodka and orange juice .

main_definition: A hand tool or power tool which engages with the head of a screw and allows torque to be applied to turn the screw, thus driving it in or loosening it.
secondary_definitions: A cocktail made of vodka and orange juice .
